Posts.Content: Jun 9, 2012 01:03AM silkuk52 wrote: Belinda-I had diep reconstruction with left mastectomy & the skin healed on top but the wound underneath was not. My PS said to make tip of gauze wet & pack the wound & tape over it. After two weeks it is finally healing. Best wishes & feel better.
Posts.Title: Surgical Incision Opening Belinda977 kira1234
